rs1.s: “I saw that you were perfect, and so I loved you. Then I saw that you were not perfect and I loved you even more.” —Angelita Lim

rs10.s: “You’re the closest to heaven, that I’ll ever be.” —Goo Goo Dolls

rs2.s: “Love is that condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own.” —Robert A. Heinlein

rs3.s: “Love is that condition in which the happiness of another person is essential to your own.” —Robert A. Heinlein

rs4.s: “The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.” –Audrey Hepburn

rs5.s: “I need you like a heart needs a beat.” –Unknown

rs6.s: “I am who I am because of you. You are every reason, every hope, and every dream I’ve ever had.” —The Notebook

rs7.s: “If I had a flower for every time I thought of you… I could walk through my garden forever.” —Alfred Tennyson

rs8.s: “Take my hand, take my whole life too. For I can’t help falling in love with you.” —Elvis Presley

rs9.s: “If you live to be a hundred, I want to live to be a hundred minus one day so I never have to live without you.” –A. A. Milne

ss1.s: "If you want to achieve greatness stop asking for permission." --Anonymous

ss10.s: "Just when the caterpillar thought the world was ending, he turned into a butterfly." --Proverb

ss2.s: "Things work out best for those who make the best of how things work out." --John Wooden

ss3.s: "To live a creative life, we must lose our fear of being wrong." --Anonymous

ss4.s: "If you are not willing to risk the usual you will have to settle for the ordinary." --Jim Rohn

ss5.s: "Trust because you are willing to accept the risk, not because it's safe or certain." --Anonymous

ss6.s: "All our dreams can come true if we have the courage to pursue them." --Walt Disney

ss7.s: "Good things come to people who wait, but better things come to those who go out and get them." --Anonymous

ss8.s: "If you do what you always did, you will get what you always got." --Anonymous

ss9.s: "Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm." --Winston Churchill

hs1.s: “Everything is theoretically impossible, until it is done.” – Robert A. Heinlein.

hs10.s: “Science is not only a disciple of reason but also one of romance and passion.” – Stephen Hawking

hs2.s: “What you learn from a life in science is the vastness of our ignorance.” – David Eagleman

hs3.s: "If I have seen further it is by standing on the shoulders of Giants." – Issac Newton

hs4.s: 5. “If a cluttered desk is a sign of a cluttered mind, of what, then, is an empty desk a sign?” – Albert Einstein

hs5.s: "Our virtues and our failures are inseparable, like force and matter. When they separate, man is no more.” – Nikola Tesla

hs6.s: “Impossible only means that you haven’t found the solution yet.” – Anonymous

hs7.s: “In science the credit goes to the man who convinces the world, not to the man to whom the idea first occurs.” – Sir William Osler

hs8.s: “Every brilliant experiment, like every great work of art, starts with an act of imagination.” – Jonah Lehrer

hs9.s: “The good thing about science is that it's true whether or not you believe in it.” – Neil deGrasse Tyson

ms1.s: Create a life that feels good on the inside, not just one that looks good on the outside.

ms10.s: Our future reality depends on what we do NOW, in this present moment.

ms2.s: I am never in control of what happens around me, but i am always in control of what happens within me.

ms3.s: There is nothing more important than this moment.

ms4.s: Follow your intuition, it will always lead you to the right destination.

ms5.s: Let your faith be bigger than your fears, have faith success will be near.

ms6.s: Realize deeply that the present moment is all you have. Make the NOW the primary focus of your life. – Eckhart Tolle

ms7.s: I BELIEVE, and therefore anything is possible.

ms8.s: No dream is too big, when you understand ABUNDANCE is your birthright.

ms9.s: The most important time in the world is the time you make for yourself.
